attributes.action: Make the production, sale and use of alcohol illegal.
attributes.background: Substantial scientific evidence shows alcohol is a harmful drug that can damage human health. There must be plans to criminalise alcohol to address the harm it causes to individuals and communities.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106719

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
